game_description: 3D Organon is a multi-award winning self-discovery experience into the human body. You can now visualize the skeletal system, muscles, vessels, nerves, and other organs in 3D. Delve into the human models and see what you are made of. The app features an extensive knowledge-base of anatomical definitions with terminology based on the official Terminologia Anatomica. 3D Organon is used by hundreds of leading universities and hospitals worldwide. Its educational advantages include gamification of learning, owing to the fact that students find the experience stimulating, engaging, and entertaining. The 3D models in 3D Organon can add important cognitive input which enhances the in-depth understanding of key anatomical concepts and retention of knowledge. 3D Organon integrates advanced teaching tools that could complement any anatomy curriculum. Educators and healthcare professionals can now visualize and explore anatomy as never before.
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), Georgian, German, German (Switzerland), Greek, Italian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Russian (Ukraine), Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela), Swiss German, Thai
review_1: But an interested spectator Id like a version which doesn’t cost £400 a year. I love picking out bones and want to play with the mushy stuff! Come on work an option out please as the b oney bits really great!
review_2: I like a few others on here downloaded without reading the reviews .. it’s good and has great potential as a teaching aid , but unless your happy just looking at and zooming in an out of a single skeleton don’t bother with this app. Overall 6/10 only because the detail is good on the small amount we actually get to view
review_3: I want to know how much this game is because I accidentally buyed it
review_4: I downloaded it expecting it to be free but it’s not plus your only limited to skeleton views.. This is a groundbreaking app that has limitless potential… I would suggest u allow guest to view everything the app has to offer for a short period just so they can see the value… Once other developers put out another app such as this for a cheaper price beat believe this app will be left on the shelf !!! So it would be wise to appeal to average non student as well as the medical community….asap!
review_5: Waste of time unless you want to pay crazy amounts. It’s cheaper to buy a book
